title: Asana - Audit Logs
description: - This dashboard provides insights to help you to track audit events within the Asana platform.

definition.content:
This dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of activities within the Asana platform, focusing on key operational areas to ensure security, compliance, and efficient management. 

It monitors essential events including logins, user updates, admin settings changes, role modifications, content exports, access control updates, app usage, and the creation and deletion of projects and tasks. 

This enables teams to maintain comprehensive oversight of all activities within the platform, ensuring real-time visibility and control.

For more information, see the [Asana Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/asana).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.

definition.title: Distribution of Events by Context Types
Top Failed Login Attempts by User
Top Failed Login Attempts by Email
Top Users whose Password was Reset
Top Role Change Activities by User

definition.content: Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates Audit logs to detect threats to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](/security).
